definition: root/stem/origin/source/this/the current/original/inherent/originally/classifier for books, periodicals, files etc
A Record of Japan, by Huang Zunxian 黃遵憲|黄遵宪[Huang2 Zun1 xian4], an extended analysis of Meiji Japan

sentences.english: The Government of Japan will receive further signatures, as the Depositary of the ACTA.
sentences.chinese: 作为协定受托国，日本国政府将负责接收进一步签名。

sentences.english: Japan's parliament has passed legislation to upgrade the country's defense agency into a full ministry.
sentences.chinese: 日本国会通过议案，将日本防卫厅升级为省。

sentences.english: Volta showed that this was not so.
sentences.chinese: 他的本国同胞伏打指出，情况并非如此。

sentences.english: If they want to participate in the political life of their country, they must disarm.
sentences.chinese: 他们如果希望参与本国的政治生活，就必须放下武器。

sentences.english: Seventhly, the two sides reiterated respecting the road of development each other has chosen according to its own national conditions.
sentences.chinese: 双方重申，尊重对方根据本国国情选择的发展道路。

sentences.english: Domestic issuers are not subject to this requirement.
sentences.chinese: 此为本国发行人所无之规定。

sentences.english: The Norwegian government is stepping in to reduce the nation's 40-percent divorce rate.
sentences.chinese: 挪威政府正采取措施降低本国40%的离婚率。

sentences.english: Logically, these countries should produce more for local markets and less for export.
sentences.chinese: 这些国家应为本国市场生产更多，而减少出口。

sentences.english: He is the high priest of amateur basketball in this country.
sentences.chinese: 他是本国业余篮球头面人物。

sentences.english: North Korea has for years relied on its nuclear build-up to squeeze aid from its neighbors and the United States.
sentences.chinese: 北韩多年来靠本国的核武库向邻国及美国榨取援助。

sentences.english: Good-neighborliness and Friendliness Policy is a basic policy of the country in our foreign affairs.
sentences.chinese: 睦邻友好政策是我国外交工作中一项基本国策。

sentences.english: In the modern time, Japanese-Chinese returns to China and is integrated with native Chinese.
sentences.chinese: 近代日式汉语回归中国，与本国语言相互融合。

sentences.english: Volunteers at the Hongqiao Station greet international visitors in foreign tongues.
sentences.chinese: 红桥站点的志愿者们用各国本国语言向外国朋友问候。

sentences.english: Together, they control most of the country.
sentences.chinese: 他们一起能控制本国大多数市场。

sentences.english: He speaks English well enough to pass for a native speaker.
sentences.chinese: 他英语流利得使人会以为他讲本国语呢。

sentences.english: CONTRAST】Contrast these foreign goods with the domestic products.
sentences.chinese: 把这些外国货和本国货货比较一下。

definition: United States/name of a country that formerly existed near Samarkand
